item.title: 3 年期国债拍卖需求旺盛，国债涨幅扩大
item.description: 国债周二上涨，在本月首次票息拍卖吸引了强劲需求后，国债延续了小幅上涨。【原文：Treasuries rose Tuesday, extending a modest advance after the first coupon auction of the month drew strong demand.】

item.title: 梅洛尼告诉 Rai1，意大利银行应为预算做出贡献
item.description: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）表示，银行将不得不再次为意大利的预算做出贡献。【原文：Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni said banks will once again have to contribute to Italy’s budget.】

item.title: 美国鸡肉价格从夏季峰值下跌 18
item.description: 在牛肉价格飙升期间，美国人听信了一句口头禅，确实吃了更多的鸡肉，家禽生产商因此赚得盆满钵满。现在，鸡肉价格下跌可能会使这一涨势终结。【原文：As Americans heeded a catchphrase and indeed ate more chicken during a beef spike, poultry producers raked in profits. Now, falling chicken prices may be bringing that rally to an end.】

item.title: 斯塔默誓言与欧盟进行关税谈判，英国钢铁行业发出危机警告
item.description: 在欧盟提议提高关税以保护本国濒临崩溃的钢铁行业后，英国钢铁行业警告称可能面临生存危机。【原文：The UK’s steel sector warned of a potentially existential crisis after the European Union proposed raising tariffs to shield its own ailing sector.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德表示欧盟机构希望法国找到预算路径
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，各机构正在观察法国的政治危机，希望政府能找到通过预算的办法。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said institutions are observing France’s political crisis and hope a government finds a way to adopt a budget.】

item.title: 银行储备减少，美联储资产负债表缩水成焦点
item.description: 就在美联储持有的银行储备不断减少的同时，美国货币市场的长期融资压力表明，央行可能越来越接近于结束其大规模证券投资组合的平仓。【原文：Prolonged funding pressures in US money markets, just as bank reserves held at the Federal Reserve are dwindling, suggest the central bank may be getting closer to ending the unwinding of its massive portfolio of securities.】

item.title: 德国央行行长称欧盟联合国防预算合理
item.description: 德国央行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）支持为欧盟国防开支制定联合预算，并建议可通过共同债务为其提供资金。【原文：Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel backed a joint budget for European Union defense spending, suggesting that this could be financed by common debt.】

item.title: Orion Resources 首席执行官确认与特朗普政府就矿业合作事宜进行谈判
item.description: 总部位于纽约的 Orion Resource Partners 投资公司创始人表示，该公司正继续与特朗普政府讨论投资矿业的潜在合作关系。【原文：Orion Resource Partners is continuing its discussions with the Trump administration about potential partnerships to invest in mining, the founder of the New York-based investment firm said.】

item.title: 美国考虑在陆地上打击卡特尔目标，特朗普中止委内瑞拉会谈
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，唐纳德-特朗普总统已经取消了美国与委内瑞拉的外交接触，这一决定有利于国务卿马可-卢比奥更为强硬的态度，并可能导致军事行动进一步升级。【原文：President Donald Trump has called off US diplomatic engagement with Venezuela, people familiar with the move said, a decision that favors Secretary of State Marco Rubio’s more hardline approach and may lead to further military escalation.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国和加拿大正在制定关税协议方案
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他希望美国和加拿大能够 "达成 "一项解决方案，解决两国在钢铁、铝和汽车行业关税问题上的争端。【原文：President Donald Trump said he expects the US and Canada can “get there” on a resolution to their dispute over sectoral tariffs on steel, aluminum and autos.】

item.title: 达里奥与格里芬一样认为黄金比美元更安全
item.description: 亿万富翁雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）说，黄金 "肯定 "是比美元更安全的避风港，黄金创纪录的涨势与 20 世纪 70 年代的情况如出一辙，当时黄金在高通胀和经济不稳定时期大涨。【原文：Billionaire Ray Dalio said that gold is “certainly” more of a safe haven than the US dollar and the metal’s record-setting rally echoes the 1970s, when it surged during a time of high inflation and economic instability.】

item.title: 第六街的伊斯特里抨击同行的零售营销策略
item.description: 在另类资产管理公司寻求攫取零售财富的过程中，Sixth Street Partners 联席首席投资官乔希-伊斯特里（Josh Easterly）指出，无处不在的私人投资营销是一个潜在的关注领域。【原文：As alternative asset managers look to capture retail wealth, Sixth Street Partners Co-Chief Investment Officer Josh Easterly flagged the ubiquitous marketing of private investments as a potential area of concern.】

item.title: 海德鲁一级公司希望首次出售高达 10 亿美元的美元债务
item.description: 加拿大公用事业公司 Hydro One Ltd. 临时首席执行官 Harry Taylor 周二在彭博加拿大金融会议上表示，该公司计划在 2026 年上半年首次出售美元债务。【原文：Canadian utility company Hydro One Ltd. plans to launch its first-ever US dollar debt sale in the first half of 2026, interim chief executive officer Harry Taylor said at the Bloomberg Canadian Finance Conference on Tuesday.】

item.title: 苏富比邀请高盛和摩根大通进行债务再融资
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，苏富比拍卖行正在与投资者就部分现有债务的再融资交易进行谈判。【原文：Sotheby’s is in talks with investors regarding a deal to refinance some of its existing debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利警告大幅降息将引发通货膨胀
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周二警告说，任何大幅降息都有可能引发通货膨胀。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari on Tuesday cautioned that any drastic cuts to interest rates would risk stoking inflation.】

item.title: 阿根廷等待美国救命稻草，米莱（Milei）美元短缺
item.description: 阿根廷财政部正在烧光美元存款以支撑比索，据交易商估计，其国库中大约还剩下 10 亿美元。【原文：Argentina’s Treasury is burning through its dollar deposits to prop up the peso, with traders estimating it has roughly $1 billion left in its coffers.】

item.title: 因中国销售疲软和关税成本，宝马下调年度业绩预期
item.description: 德国汽车制造商宝马汽车公司（BMW AG）表示，由于中国市场销售持续疲软、向中国经销商支付的费用以及关税成本，该公司下调了年度指导目标。【原文：BMW AG lowered its annual guidance on persistently weak China sales, payments to dealers in the country and tariff costs, the German car manufacturer said.】

item.title: CoreWeave 回击改变核心科技竞标的想法
item.description: CoreWeave Inc.首席执行官迈克尔-英特莱特（Michael Intrator）回击了改变以 90 亿美元收购科睿科学公司（Core Scientific Inc.【原文：CoreWeave Inc. Chief Executive Officer Michael Intrator pushed back on the idea of changing a $9 billion bid for Core Scientific Inc. after one of the acquisition target’s biggest investors said it was a lowball offer.】

item.title: 联邦政府关门加剧特区经济困境
item.description:
长期休假或解雇可能会加剧首都地区的经济放缓。【原文：

A prolonged period of furloughs — or firings — could worsen a slowdown for the capital region.

】

item.title: NBF 的马里昂称加拿大赤字将激增至 720 亿加元
item.description: 加拿大的一家主要贷款机构称，加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）将把该国的赤字推高至约占国内生产总值的 3%，因为他的政府正在推行重大项目并试图吸引更多投资。【原文：One of Canada’s major lenders says Prime Minister Mark Carney will push the country’s deficit to about 3% of its gross domestic product as his government pursues major projects and tries to attract more investment.】

item.title: 摩根大通牵头为 Qualtrics 交易提供 50 亿美元贷款融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is leading a roughly $5 billion loan financing to support Qualtrics International Inc.’s purchase of health-care survey firm Press Ganey Forsta, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 拉加德认为加强欧元基础可带来持久益处
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）呼吁各国政府努力将欧元转变为真正的全球货币，使该地区的经济蓬勃发展。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde appealed to governments to work toward turning the euro into a truly global currency that will allow the region’s economy to thrive.】

item.title: 甲骨文因报告称其云业务利润率低于预期而下挫
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）发布报告称，该软件制造商云计算业务的利润率低于华尔街许多人的预期，导致该公司股价暴跌。【原文：Oracle Corp. shares tumbled after a report that the software maker’s profit margin in its cloud computing business is lower than many on Wall Street have been estimating.】

item.title: 德国央行行长敦促默茨加速经济改革
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，德国政府必须加大力度解决经济的深层次问题，提高经济增长潜力。【原文：Germany’s government must step up efforts to tackle the economy’s deep-seated problems and increase its growth potential, Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel said.】

item.title: 据说 Janus Henderson 将反对 Advent 出价 13 亿美元收购 U-blox
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，獐子岛亨德森集团（Janus Henderson Group Inc.【原文：Janus Henderson Group Inc. will not tender its shares in U-blox Holding AG for Advent’s 1.05 billion Swiss franc ($1.3 billion) takeover bid of the chipmaker, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 关于当下发生的事情的七点思考
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 英国金融监管机构面临债券磁带拍卖存在缺陷的指控
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局正面临指控，称其债券数据项目的拍卖过程因技术问题和利益冲突而有失公平。【原文：The UK’s Financial Conduct Authority is facing allegations that its auction process for a bond data project was unfair because of a technical issue and conflict of interest.】

item.title: 温克艾沃斯的双子座公司首次公开募股（IPO）陷入低谷后，市场反应冷淡
item.description: 双子座空间站公司（Gemini Space Station Inc.）在 9 月份上市后的几天内就抹去了首次公开募股的收益，分析师们只提供了适度的支持，并在他们的初始报告中警告说，这家加密公司面临着日益激烈的竞争和盈利能力不足的问题。【原文：Gemini Space Station Inc. wiped out gains from its initial public offering within days of its September debut, and analysts are offering only modest support, warning in their initiations of coverage that the crypto company faces increasing competition and a lack of profitability.】

item.title: 米兰认为美联储双重目标的紧张程度低于同行
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）说，他不认为央行的两个目标之间会像他的一些其他决策者那样紧张。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said he doesn’t see as much tension between the central bank’s two goals as some of his fellow policymakers do.】

item.title: 交易商关注美国农业援助，大豆期货走高
item.description: 周二，大豆价格上扬，原因是市场猜测美国农场救助计划的前景可能有助于增强生产商的财务状况并阻止作物抛售。【原文：Soybean prices ticked up Tuesday on speculation that the prospect of a US farm bailout could help bolster producer finances and stem crop selling.】
